about_the_game:
In this Tower Defense game, inspired by classics like Bloons and Kingdom Rush, we introduce a unique twist: the ability to move towers across the map using the "War Machine."

The concept is simple—defend your base against an invasion of over 15 different types of robots.

You'll need heavy weaponry, as the robots are made of advanced materials. Humanity has built a series of towers to face this challenge, and your mission is to choose from more than 10 types of towers to determine the best strategy to destroy all the robots! But it won’t be easy—you’ll have limited resources to buy, move, and unlock areas to place them.

Moreover, each map presents its own unique challenges, such as tunnels, impassable locations, or shortcuts.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A movement-based tower defense where you must use good strategies to place towers and prevent artificial intelligence from overcoming humans.
